mapper.select: select p.pro_code, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, s.sto_size, sh.shop_name, s.sto_amount, p.PRO_IMG, p.PRO_BARCODE from product p, stock s, shop sh where p.pro_code = s.sto_pronum and sh.shop_num=sto_shopnum and p.pro_code = #{pname} and sh.shop_num = #{shop_num}
select sto_amount from stock where sto_pronum = #{code} and sto_size = #{size} and sto_shopnum = #{shopnum}
mapper.update: update stock set sto_amount = #{amount} where sto_pronum = #{code} and sto_size = #{size} and sto_shopnum = #{shopnum}
update member set mem_mileage = #{mile} where mem_num = #{cusnum}
update member set mem_mileage= mem_mileage+#{mem_mileage} where mem_num = #{mem_num}
